Created attachment 34939
View Results Tree result showing the results

Hello,
It seems Bug 60928 did not fully solve the issue.

When doing a Load Test with Parallel Download of Embedded resources, we have a request that leads to recursive download.

This ends with "Timeout waiting for connection from pool" which is set to 3 seconds by default.
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
